definition: to whom the deer falls (idiom); the one to emerge victor (i.e. to seize the empire)/prize winner/champion
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
He laughs best who laughs last.
pinyin: shei2 xiao4 dao4 zui4 hou4 , shei2 xiao4 de2 zui4 hao3
containing_words.word: 誰笑到最後，誰笑得最好

sentences.english: Still, who are we to say that we can stay?
sentences.chinese: 然而，誰有敢說我們能長留此地？

sentences.english: Who cut the strings, so Duanchang impact of the song.
sentences.chinese: 是誰剪斷了琴絃，彈着如此斷腸的曲。

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 誰讓你起得這麼晚，整個赤血宮就你這個時辰才起牀。

sentences.english: And who can argue with Orwell?
sentences.chinese: 誰可以跟奧維爾爭論呢？

sentences.english: Tom is an easygoing type of person who gets along well with everyone.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是那種隨和的人，跟誰都合得來。

sentences.english: People seem to sense who is powerful.
sentences.chinese: 人們似乎憑感覺就知道誰擁有權力。

sentences.english: The woman behind me, whoever she is, whispers about sedatives.
sentences.chinese: 我後面的女人，不知道是誰，悄聲說着鎮靜藥。

sentences.english: Who would have thought a pansy could be such a naughty little flower.
sentences.chinese: 誰曾想到一三色堇可能是這樣一個頑皮的花。

sentences.english: Who speaks words that are lovelier than those of Jesus?
sentences.chinese: 有誰說的話比耶穌更動聽？

sentences.english: Think about it: who needs whom?
sentences.chinese: 想想，到底是誰離不開誰？

sentences.english: Think about it: who needs whom?
sentences.chinese: 想想，到底是誰離不開誰？

sentences.english: Some glorious morn--but when? Ah, who shall say?
sentences.chinese: 光榮的黎明，誰能說何時出現？

sentences.english: As with the Wal-Mart dream, I know better.
sentences.chinese: 就像誰人沃爾瑪的夢那樣，我就曉得。

sentences.english: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.
sentences.chinese: 此中有隻箱子特別重，可誰也弄不清是怎麼回事。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
